solution_line_template: Yesterday, Uncle Welly was able to plant {roses_two_days_ago} + {more_roses_yesterday} = <<{roses_two_days_ago}+{more_roses_yesterday}={roses_yesterday}>>{roses_yesterday} roses.

Therefore, Uncle Welly has {roses_two_days_ago} + {roses_yesterday} + {roses_today} = <<{roses_two_days_ago}+{roses_yesterday}+{roses_today}={total_roses}>>{total_roses} roses planted on his vacant lot.
